dict.acceptation: 煽动，怂恿；用蛋烹调；<俚>向人扔鸡蛋；

sent.orig: EGG waveform of most patients were abnormal, appearing a notch or steep in opening phase dominantly.
sent.trans: 结果：声带囊肿患者EGG波形多呈现异常，且多为渐开相切迹或陡直。

sent.orig: OBJECTIVE:To explore the relationship between DGP syndromes in Chinese medicin e and the changes in EGG.
sent.trans: 目的：探讨DGP中医证型与体表胃电图(EGG)改变的关系。

sent.orig: We have pan-fried egg, scramble egg, boiled egg, poached egg.
sent.trans: 我们有煎蛋，炒蛋，煮蛋，荷包蛋。

sent.orig: Two traditional Easter egg games are the Easter Egg Hunt and the Easter Egg Roll.
sent.trans: 寻找彩蛋和滚彩蛋是两项传统的复活节彩蛋游戏。

sent.orig: Shortly after opening the fake egg, egg yolk and egg white will melt together.
sent.trans: 假鸡蛋打开后不久，蛋黄和蛋清就会融到一起。
